articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: Chris Umphlett
articles.contents:
ChrisUmphlett.com
          
          
          Home
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Chris Umphlett
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        LinkedIn
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        Email
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            A part of good science is to see what everyone else
            can see but to think what no one else has ever said ~
            Amos Tversky
            
            Bio
            Chris is the Manager of Data Analysis and Data Privacy at
            TechSmith, the
            makers of great software like Snagit and Camtasia. At
            TechSmith he works with stakeholders across the company on
            analytics and data science projects.
            Chris is the author of several R packages
            hosted on CRAN:
            marketr
            ibmAcousticR
            reveneraR
            zdeskR
            zoomr
            Chris lives in East Lansing, MI with his wife and four
            young children.
            
            
            Education
            Central Michigan University | MA,
            Economics | Aug 2010 - May 2012
            Univ of North Carolina, Chapel Hill |
            BS, Business Administration & Minor, Anthropology | Aug
            2002 - May 2006
            
            
            Career
            TechSmith | Manager of Data Analysis and
            Data Privacy | Dec 2019 - Present
            Consumers Energy | Data Scientist | Oct
            2018 - Dec 2019
            Jackson National Life | Sr Operations
            Data Analyst | Mar 2012 - Sept 2018
            Kellogg’s | Intern, Sales Analytics |
            May 2011 - Mar 2012
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Chris Umphlett
